template.name: AAF_gene2exonTranscript1

query.view: Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.transcripts.exonCount Gene.exons.identifier

constraint.description: Show predicted transcripts and exons for gene:

template.name: AAG_gene2ProteinInteraction2StructureNEW3

template.description: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

constraint.description: Show proteins for the gene:

template.name: AAI_gene2ChromosomeLocation1

constraint.description: Show the chromosome and the chromosome location for gene:

template.name: AAJ_synonymGene2exonChromosomeLocations1

from organism:

between base:

template.description: Search for genes with a particular RNAi phenotype. (Note: RNAi phenotypes are currently only available for C. elegans).

constraint.description: Search for C. elegans orthologues for gene:

template.name: AAX_genes2CERNAi
template.description: Show the C. elegans orthologue and RNAi phenotypes for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: AAX_genes2CERNAi
query.view: Gene Gene.identifier Gene.name Gene.orthologues.subject Gene.orthologues.subject.identifier Gene.orthologues.subject.name Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.property.RNAiCode Gene.orthologues.subject.annotations.property.name
